gui.form.utility

Class RegexCheckedInputBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.InputBox
        • gui.form.utility.RegexCheckedInputBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, Checkable, AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>

    public class RegexCheckedInputBox
extends InputBox
implements Checkable
    InputBox of which the contents can be validated with a regular expression.
